All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AddItemFragment
Class encapsulates business logic for the AddItemFragment
AddItemFragment.AddItemInteractionInterface
Interface used to attach an activity to this Fragment Enables methods defined in activity to be used in the fragment
DataBase
This class represents the cloud database the app is connecting to.
DataBase.ItemListUpdateListener
Interface for itemList listeners

Class encapsulates business logic for the AddItemFragment
EditItemFragment.EditItemInteractionInterface
Interface used to attach an activity to this Fragment Enables methods defined in activity to be used in the fragment
Item
This class represents an item.
